School Registration
Email Registration
This section deals with the registration of electronic mails addresses that will be used by this application in the processing of backups of the school records at the end of the term or session.
  • Enter at least one email address in the input box below.
  • If the school have multiple email addresses, click the add button shown to enable the entry of multiple addresses.
  • If there be any reason whatsoever to do away with an address, click the trash button next to the specific email address to delete it.
  • Note during back up of the school records to email, all the registered email address will be updated of the backup. On this note, therefore, if this is not desired, register only those email to which the backup is desired.

Academic grading system

The settings below allows the settings for the total score obtainable in a particular domain of test. Here, you can set the total score obtainable in the Continuous assessment (CA) and the Examination domain.

It should be noted that the toatl score obtainable sums to 100%. An error will be thrown if this rule is violated.

If there is a reason why you feel the sum of the total obtainables be greater than 100%, contact the Quatron development team for a feature request

Academic report commenting
This section allows the extension of the built-in library for the academic report commenting. If the settings in this section is ignored, then the default built-in library of comments will be used in the comment section of each students acdemic report sheet.
On the basis of guidelines, read the following instructions.
  • This section require the upload of the file that contains the comments desired.
  • The settings require that only the Class teacher comments and the Principal/Head teacher comments are to be uploaded. If this restrictive settings creates a problem on the basis of incompatibility with the structure of the school record system, you can Click here to send a feature request to the Quatron team
  • There can only be one file upload at a time for a particular comment type.
  • The extensions of the uploaded file can be PDF(.pdf), Word(.docx) and Text(.txt).
  • The comment file can be named abitrarily.
  • There is no limit to the number of comments in each of the comment file.
  • If there be any reason to change the file uploaded, click on the Browse button to initiate the file exploration process.

Color system (Optional)

This section is an optional part for the school registration. In this section, if the school desire, select at least three color scheme associated with the school. The required color system is essentially the color scheme that is peculiar to the school, perhaps as outlined by the school's student uniform.

Note that if this settings is not configured, the default color scheme of Quatron will be used. This default color system is a combination of opaque green, midnight blue and white.
